data:
Rule 1: The N stage is determined by the number of involved axillary lymph nodes.
Rule 2: N0 indicates no involved axillary lymph nodes.
Rule 3: N1 indicates 1-3 involved axillary lymph nodes.
Rule 4: N2 indicates 4-9 involved axillary lymph nodes.
Rule 5: N3 indicates 10 or more involved axillary lymph nodes.
Rule 6: The presence of extracapsular tumor extension does not affect the N stage.
Rule 7: The size of the metastatic deposit in the lymph node does not affect the N stage.
Rule 8: The number of lymph nodes examined is not used in determining the N stage, only the number of involved lymph nodes.
